title: Need contact of management(URGENT!!)
content: I took admission during round 1 of PESSAT but didn’t submit original documents, I have to submit original documents for which I’ll come to Bangalore on 23 but the thing is that I’ve lost my 10th marksheet and I applied for a duplicate marksheet on 9th July but haven’t recieved it still and don’t think I will till 23 so I need to talk to someone in management who can allow me to submit the marksheet later and I can proceed with submitting the other documents now so please someone get me in contact it’s urgent.
